mapper.select: SELECT T1.USER_NO , T1.USER_NAME , SUM ( CASE WHEN T2.H_CAUSE = '연차지급' THEN T2.H_GIVE ELSE 0 END ) AS GIVE_DAY , SUM ( CASE WHEN T2.H_CAUSE = '연차사용' THEN T2.H_GIVE ELSE 0 END ) AS USE_DAY , SUM ( CASE WHEN T2.H_CAUSE = '추가지급' THEN T2.H_GIVE ELSE 0 END ) AS ADD_DAY FROM MEMBER T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN HOLIDAY T2 ON T1.USER_NO = T2.USER_NO GROUP BY T1.USER_NO , T1.USER_NAME ORDER BY T1.USER_NO ASC
SELECT HOLIDAY_NO , H.USER_NO , USER_NAME , H_TYPE , H_SORT , H_START , H_FINISH , H_DATE , H_REASON , H.STATUS FROM HOLIDAY_APPLY H join member on (member.user_no = h.user_no)

select holiday_no , T1.user_no , user_name , h_type , h_sort , h_start , h_finish , h_date , h_reason , T1.status from holiday_apply T1 join member T2 on (T1.user_no = T2.user_no) where T1.status='승인대기'
mapper.insert: Insert into work ( work_no , user_no , work_date , work_in , work_out , work_time , status ) select seq_wno.nextval , m.user_no,to_(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:SS') , null , null , null , '결근' from member m where m.status ='Y'
mapper.select: select work_no , user_name , to_char(work_date, 'YYYY"년"MM"월"DD"일"' ) as work_date , to_char(work_in, 'hh24:MI') as work_in , to_char(work_out,'hh24:MI') as work_out , work_time , w.status from work w join member m on (w.user_no = m.user_no) where w.user_no = #{userNo} AND WORK_DATE = to_char(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD')
mapper.update: update work set work_in = sysdate where USER_NO = #{userNo} AND WORK_DATE= to_char(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD')

update work set work_out = sysdate , work_time = (select ROUND(((work_out-work_in)*24)-1) FROM work where USER_NO = 3 AND WORK_DATE= to_char(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD')) where USER_NO = #{userNo} AND WORK_DATE= to_char(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD')
mapper.select: SELECT T1.USER_NO , T1.USER_NAME , SUM ( CASE WHEN T2.H_CAUSE = '연차지급' THEN T2.H_GIVE ELSE 0 END ) AS GIVE_DAY , SUM ( CASE WHEN T2.H_CAUSE = '연차사용' THEN T2.H_GIVE ELSE 0 END ) AS USE_DAY , SUM ( CASE WHEN T2.H_CAUSE = '추가지급' THEN T2.H_GIVE ELSE 0 END ) AS ADD_DAY FROM MEMBER T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN HOLIDAY T2 ON T1.USER_NO = T2.USER_NO WHERE T1.USER_NO= #{userNo} GROUP BY T1.USER_NO , T1.USER_NAME
